Group Members

Principle Investigator

Prof. Atrisha Sarkar

Assistant Professor in the Dept. of Electrical and Computer Engineering at Western University.

Graduate Students

Fully funded Masters, and PhD positions are open for application! Please contact Prof. Sarkar to make an appointment. I accept international students only for PhD positions unless I am familiar with your work.

Jonathan Bowen

Research Assistant

May 2025 - Present

Jonathan is working on the foundations of trust between humans and generative AI agents. He is a Phd student in the Department of Philosophy at Western University.

Undergraduate Students

Welcome undergraduate students to join our research group! Please contact Prof. Sarkar to make an appointment for interview.

Jennifer Shi

May 2025 - Present

Jennifer is creating a new simulation framework using empirical game theory and generative AI agents for socio-ecological systems. She is also pursuing her B.Eng. degree in Software Engineering at Western University.

  • Prof. Christopher Frantz, Norwegian University of Science and Technology (NTNU)
  • Prof. Christian Kimmich, Institute for Advanced Studies, Vienna
  • Prof. Saba Siddiki, Syracuse University
